scripts.install: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/install.js | pino-pretty
scripts.force-install: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/install.js -f | pino-pretty
scripts.start: npm run build && node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/server.js | pino-pretty
scripts.istart: npm run install && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run force-install && nodemon --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/server.js | pino-pretty
